name: Spiral
description:
Prototype of the game Spiral that I am developing for my first level design class..

V4 - first 3 levels of the original game idea

ALLEGEDLY, You play as a thief who is robbing a mysterious mansion. Traveling deeper in you discover an interesting looking potion. There is something more to it than we really know...

The original game idea consist of the potion allowing the player to go back in time a couple seconds while battling a the main antagonist who has the ability to warp the playing field.
